text:
Lurk指从外表上看，seem指内心的判断；appear指给人以表面的印象。
- appear wise, look like his father.

107. gather, collect
gather指分散的东西集中到一起；collect指精心地、有选择地整理好收集的物。
- collect stamps.

108. mean to do, mean doing
mean to do 打算，想要做某事；mean doing 意思是，意味着。
- By this 7 mean giving the students more practice.

109. die from, die of
die from 表示死于(枪)伤，衰竭，过度劳累，饮食过肥等。die of 表示死于疾病、饥饿、寒冷、年老、忧郁、失恋等精神因素。die of hunger and cold.

110. pay for, pay back, pay off
pay for 为……付钱；pay back 还钱，但不一定还清；pay off 还清。
- pay for the book, pay off the debt.

111. divide, separate
divide 把一个整体分成D部分，separate 把存在一起的个体分开。
- divide the apple, separate the houses.

112. active, get, reach
active 不及物动词，指在(in 大地点)，at(小地点)；get 不及物动词，指to: reach 及物动词，指to: reach in Beijing, get to Beijing, reach Beijing.

113. grow, plant
grow 使某种植物在基地生长或者使某处属于某；plant 移植，移栽已经长成新的植物。Plans the trees, the trees are growing.

114. manage, try
manage to do 设法做或做某事；try to do 尽力去做某事，但不一定成功。
- He tried to pass the exam, but he failed.
